甿字的基本解释

甿
méng
同“氓1”。

甿字的汉语字典释义

[①]［méng］
［《廣韻》莫耕切，平耕，明。］
(1)古称种田的人。
(2)泛指百姓。

甿字的康熙字典解释

【午集上】【田字部】　甿； 康熙笔画：8； 页码：页759第12
【唐韻】武庚切【集韻】謨耕切【正韻】眉庚切，?音甍。【說文】田，民也。【周禮·地官·遂人】以下劑致甿，以田里安甿。【註】變民言甿，異外內也。甿，猶懵懵無知貌也。【管子·揆度篇】桓公憂北郭民之貧，召管子而問曰：北郭者，盡屨縷之甿也。　又【五韻集韻】武登切，音瞢。義同。　又【集韻】莫郞切，音茫。曠野，或書作?。　又母亙切，音懜。【博雅】癡也。一曰田民。

甿字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
甿字的起名意思

暂无。

Hooligan
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［méng］
["Guangyun" Mo Gengqie, Flat Plowing, Ming. ]
(1) In ancient times, people who farmed.
(2) Refers to the common people in general.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Won Collection 1] [Tian Zi Department] 　 Meng; Kangxi strokes: 8; Page number: page 759 12
[Tang Yun] Wu Gengqie [Jiyun] Mo Gengqie [Zheng Yun] Eyebrow Gengqie,? Yin Su. [Said Wen] Tian, Min Ye. 【Zhou Li·Diguan·Suiren】The following agents are used to cause the gangsters, and the fields are used for the gangsters. [Note] To change the people's speech is also different from the outside and inside. Rogue, still ignorant and ignorant. [Guan Zi·Kidu Chapter] Huan Gong was worried about the poverty of the people in Beiguo, so he called Guan Zi and asked: The people of Beiguo are all the gangsters.　[Five Rhymes Jiyun] Wu Dengqie, sound. The same meaning.　[Jiyun] Mo Yunqie, the sound is loud. The wilderness, or book writing?.　The mother is cut again, the sound is 懜. 【Bo Ya】I'm crazy. One is Tian Min.
